jsky.util
Class I18N

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jsky.util.I18N
public class I18N
extends java.lang.Object

Simple utility class for accessing property file resource bundles for internationalization.

This class assumes one property file per package, as needed. The convention used here is to store the property files in a subdirectory of the package named i18n. The base name is gui, so the default property file is i18n/gui.properties. The UK version would then be i18n/gui_gb.properties. The property files need to be installed in the same relative directory in the classes dir or jar file before use.
